Departamentos

About

Jacinto 2.0 is a platform where you can create and/or solve clinical cases with learning purposes. Cases are distributed on several topics.

You can act as a learner, solving clinical cases inspired in the real world. You can likewise participate in creating new cases to be solved by others.
